#Text=How to Annoy People in Elevators
#Text=An elevator is almost the perfect environment to be a prankster .
#Text=It ’s easy to annoy people when you are cramped in such a small , tight space .
#Text=Because elevator rides usually last less than a minute , make sure your pranks are quick and have a lot of punch .
#Text=When annoying people on an elevator , keep your pranks lighthearted and fun as opposed to mean - spirited so that everyone leaving the elevator will have a pleasant story to tell .
#Text=Method 1 Using the Elevator to Annoy People
#Text=Push all the buttons .
#Text=When you get into the elevator , push the button for every floor .
#Text=This makes everyone ’s ride on the elevator longer , if only for a few seconds .
#Text=If you want to take it a step further , look around questioningly at everyone in the elevator when no one gets off at the floors you pushed . [ 1 ]
#Text=When someone comes in , say , " I 've got this , " before you push all of the buttons .
#Text=You can also push all the buttons as you reach the floor you are getting off at .
#Text=If someone asks you why you pushed all the buttons , you can honestly say , " It was just a joke ! "
#Text=Make a dinging noise at each floor .
#Text=Every time the elevator reaches a new floor , say “ ding ! ” very loudly .
#Text=You can even sing the word “ ding ” on each floor like notes in a scale , getting higher as you reach each new floor . [ 2 ]
#Text=You can make other noises if you prefer , such as a bird cawing or an explosion sound every time a button is pushed .
#Text=Talk to your reflection in the mirror .
#Text=Many elevators have mirrors on the walls .
#Text=A great way to be mischievous in an elevator is to carry on a running commentary while you look at yourself in the mirror .
#Text=You could look at yourself , turning to catch different angles and say “ All right , all right , now we ’re talking , ” very loudly .
#Text=You could also keep adjusting your shirt or your hair , keeping a running dialogue about what look is best for you .
#Text=Stand in the corner of the elevator facing the wall .
#Text=Do n't say anything the whole ride .
#Text=Dance to the elevator music .
#Text=Many elevators play music in the background , usually soft rock or smooth jazz .
#Text=If you ’re in an elevator that is playing music , start to dance .
#Text=Start just bobbing your head and tapping your feet , and then get your whole body into it .
#Text=Take up as much space as you can to dance until everyone is staring at you . [ 3 ]
#Text=Announce every floor .
#Text=At every floor , make a loud announcement telling everyone the floor number .
#Text=Say something like “ Everyone going to floor ten , get off now ! No time to dilly dally ! ” [ 4 ]
#Text=You can also pretend to conduct people onto the elevator , saying “ All aboard the elevator train ! ”
#Text=Exclaim that you 've lost a beast .

#Text=When the elevator is going from the bottom floor to the top , as soon as the doors close , exclaim that you lost your tarantula / snake / scorpion but confirm that it is somewhere in the elevator .
#Text=Most people will probably see that this is a joke .
#Text=However , if somebody looks seriously alarmed or is starting to panic , let them know that you were not being serious .
#Text=Build in or add something to the elevator .
#Text=For example , build a Lego city in the middle of the elevator .
#Text=Lay a Twister mat on the floor and ask people if they want to play .
#Text=Talk to people .
#Text=When there are a lot of people , say , " You 're probably wondering why I 've gathered you here today . "

#Text=Add the ingredients to the muffin pan . Add the flour mixture . Assemble the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients . Prepare the cupcakes or mold them into a muffin pan . Bake in the oven for 18 - 20 minutes . Cool , then frost ! Enjoy !
